column4: I can't install abiword because my repository server doesn't seem to have a "libgdome2-0" package. I thought it was a typo
pastebin exactly what you are executing and the full output
wait... now I'm having a weird problem with gksu
gksudo seems to work but gksu doesn't
one problem at a time
#2 was found while trying to change the server to solve #1
problem 1 solved, the main server works, it's just the spain server the one having trouble with abiword
ok, what are you executing with gksu that doesn't work?
software-properties-gtk
first from the menu, then from command line
what happens exactly?
it asks me for my password and then does nothing, it just returns to the prompt
does it work with a different command?
gksudo does work, but gksu doesn't. I'll try other GUI programs apart from apt-related
same for `gksu nautilus` and `gksudo nautilus`. Latter works, former doesn't.
which is pretty weird since gksudo is a link to gksu
!ot | Nayr
will try to solve this later
internally, the code checks how it's called and acts differently
just read something about a gconf entry, will see that after dinner
k, good luck
